April 21 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:: *AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - SIGNING OF $500M LOAN FACILITY *AIRTEL AFRICA - FACILITY WILL BE USED TO PARTIALLY REFINANCE GROUP'S EUR 750M EURO DENOMINATED BOND
